name: Backpack Darkened
description:
Dark theme for backpackit.com.  All tabs now complete.

27 Jan 2009 - Added support for comments icons and pages.
22 Dec 2008 - Updates for site changes and for sites with less than 5 pages.
03 Dec 2008 - Minor style and logo updates.
26 Nov 2008 - Updates for site changes, added styling for site announcements.
